seg-source.mrk: Business Catalog

target.mrk: 業務目錄

trans-unit.source: Displays all models you are authorized to use.

seg-source.mrk: Displays all models you are authorized to use.

target.mrk: 顯示所有您有權限使用的模型。

trans-unit.source: In the Business Catalog, you can find the right model to create a story for analysis thanks to the semantic layer, its descriptions, its tags, and the assignment of a business use.

seg-source.mrk: In the Business Catalog, you can find the right model to create a story for analysis thanks to the semantic layer, its descriptions, its tags, and the assignment of a business use.

target.mrk: 您可在業務目錄中，透過語意層、說明、標籤和業務用途指派，找到正確模型以建立要分析的故事。

trans-unit.source: The Business Catalog gives an overview of all the models you can use, across all the Spaces you are authorized for. When there are too many models, not all the models are shown at once. You can load more models by choosing <uicontrol>Show more</uicontrol> at the end of the list.

seg-source.mrk: The Business Catalog gives an overview of all the models you can use, across all the Spaces you are authorized for.
When there are too many models, not all the models are shown at once.
You can load more models by choosing <uicontrol>Show more</uicontrol> at the end of the list.

target.mrk: 在有權限使用的所有空間中，業務目錄提供所有您可用的模型概觀。
若模型過多，可能不會一次顯示全部，
可選擇清單結尾的 <uicontrol>[顯示更多]</uicontrol> 來載入更多模型。

trans-unit.source: The models are grouped using the following categories:

seg-source.mrk: The models are grouped using the following categories:

target.mrk: 模型將使用下列種類進行分組：

trans-unit.source: analytical datasets: An analytical dataset is data that indicates a specific transaction, like the sale of a product. Analytical datasets can be used for stories.

seg-source.mrk: analytical datasets:
An analytical dataset is data that indicates a specific transaction, like the sale of a product.
Analytical datasets can be used for stories.

target.mrk: 分析資料集：
分析資料集是說明特定交易 (例如產品銷售) 的資料，
其可用於故事。

trans-unit.source: dimensions: Dimensions are used to group data whose content is logically connected. The customer dimension could, for example, be made up of the customer number, the customer group and the levels of the customer hierarchy.

seg-source.mrk: dimensions:
Dimensions are used to group data whose content is logically connected.
The customer dimension could, for example, be made up of the customer number, the customer group and the levels of the customer hierarchy.

target.mrk: 維度：
維度用來分組已邏輯連線的內容資料。
例如，客戶維度可由客戶號碼、客戶群組和客戶階層層次所組成。

trans-unit.source: relational datasets: A relational dataset is the basic format of a model.

seg-source.mrk: relational datasets:
A relational dataset is the basic format of a model.

target.mrk: 關係資料集：
關係資料集是模型的基本格式。

trans-unit.source: perspectives: Perspectives can be used in stories.

seg-source.mrk: perspectives:
Perspectives can be used in stories.

target.mrk: 層面：
層面可用在故事中。

trans-unit.source: By default, you see your object’s business name. If you want to see the technical name instead of the business name, choose <menucascade><uicontrol>Your user icon</uicontrol><uicontrol>Settings</uicontrol><uicontrol>UI Settings</uicontrol><uicontrol>Show Technical Name</uicontrol></menucascade> .

seg-source.mrk: By default, you see your object’s business name.

If you want to see the technical name instead of the business name, choose <menucascade><uicontrol>Your user icon</uicontrol><uicontrol>Settings</uicontrol><uicontrol>UI Settings</uicontrol><uicontrol>Show Technical Name</uicontrol></menucascade> .

target.mrk: 按預設，您會看到物件的業務名稱。
若要查看技術名稱而不是業務名稱，依序選擇 <menucascade><uicontrol>[您的使用者圖示]</uicontrol><uicontrol>[設定]</uicontrol><uicontrol>[使用者介面設定]</uicontrol><uicontrol>[顯示技術名稱]</uicontrol></menucascade>。

trans-unit.source: You can use the following functions:

seg-source.mrk: You can use the following functions:

target.mrk: 下列功能可供使用：

seg-source.mrk: Search for Objects

target.mrk: 搜尋物件

trans-unit.source: You can either view all models or browse by relational dataset, dimension, analytical dataset, or perspective. You can search for your objects using fuzzy search. If you have defined tags for your objects, you can also search for these.

seg-source.mrk: You can either view all models or browse by relational dataset, dimension, analytical dataset, or perspective.
You can search for your objects using fuzzy search.
If you have defined tags for your objects, you can also search for these.

target.mrk: 您可檢視所有模型，或按關聯資料集、維度、分析資料集或層面瀏覽。
可使用相似內文搜尋物件。
若已定義物件的標籤，也可搜尋這些標籤。

seg-source.mrk: Create New Objects

target.mrk: 建立新物件

trans-unit.source: You can create new objects directly from the Business Catalog so that you can continuously work even if entities are not found in the Catalog. Choose <sap-icon-font conkeyref="loiob6f74c490ee5467b8efef730b03675de/tool_create"><sap-icon-font-size/> <sap-icon-font-color/> <sap-icon-background-color/> <sap-icon-font-character/> <sap-icon-font-description/></sap-icon-font> on the toolbar. Choose your type of object and you will be on the toolbar. Choose your type of object and you will be taken directly to the Data Builder or the Story Builder.

seg-source.mrk: You can create new objects directly from the Business Catalog so that you can continuously work even if entities are not found in the Catalog.

Choose <sap-icon-font conkeyref="loiob6f74c490ee5467b8efef730b03675de/tool_create"><sap-icon-font-size/> <sap-icon-font-color/> <sap-icon-background-color/> <sap-icon-font-character/> <sap-icon-font-description/></sap-icon-font> on the toolbar.
Choose your type of object and you will be on the toolbar.
Choose your type of object and you will be taken directly to the Data Builder or the Story Builder.

target.mrk: 您可直接從業務目錄建立新物件，即使目錄中找不到實體時，仍可繼續作業。

選擇工具列上的 <sap-icon-font conkeyref="loiob6f74c490ee5467b8efef730b03675de/tool_create"><sap-icon-font-size/> <sap-icon-font-color/> <sap-icon-background-color/> <sap-icon-font-character/> <sap-icon-font-description/></sap-icon-font>。
選擇物件類型便會回到工具列。
選擇物件類型後將直接瀏覽至資料模型建立器或故事建立器。

seg-source.mrk: Edit Objects

target.mrk: 編輯物件

trans-unit.source: You can go to the editor of each object by choosing <sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/> <sap-icon-font-color/> <sap-icon-background-color/> <sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character> <sap-icon-font-description/></sap-icon-font> <uicontrol>Open in Data Builder</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: You can go to the editor of each object by choosing <sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/> <sap-icon-font-color/> <sap-icon-background-color/> <sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character> <sap-icon-font-description/></sap-icon-font> <uicontrol>Open in Data Builder</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 您可選擇 <sap-icon-font><sap-icon-font-size/> <sap-icon-font-color/> <sap-icon-background-color/> <sap-icon-font-character></sap-icon-font-character> <sap-icon-font-description/></sap-icon-font> <uicontrol>[在資料模型建立器中開啟]</uicontrol>，前往各物件的編輯器。
